title: Drug-Induced Hyperthermic Syndromes in Psychiatry
itunes:title: Drug-Induced Hyperthermic Syndromes in Psychiatry
description:
When a patient presents with markedly elevated temperature and altered mental status, is it neuroleptic malignant syndrome or serotonin syndrome? If you do not have a medication list, some clinical signs may help.

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 27
  • Drug-Induced Hyperthermic Syndromes in Psychiatry
